reviews.name: Andrii Samoilenko
reviews.text: Vladyslav was an excellent teammate, studied diligently, and always helped in challenging situations. He is a great team player and loves to use new technologies in projects.

reviews.name: Viktoriia Kalachova
reviews.text: I am thrilled to recommend Vladyslav Skopenko, who excelled as our Scrum Master and developer on the Fundament project. His leadership and technical skills were instrumental in our project's success. Vladyslav's adept management of agile processes ensured our team remained focused and productive, while his proactive approach to problem-solving fostered a collaborative environment. Beyond his role as Scrum Master, Vladyslav demonstrated exceptional technical prowess by integrating a Telegram bot into our application. His innovative approach and meticulous attention to detail resulted in a seamless user experience. His hands-on involvement in the deployment process further showcased his commitment to quality and excellence. Vladyslav's collaborative spirit and positive attitude were infectious, inspiring the team to strive for excellence. His diverse skills, combined with his leadership qualities, make him an invaluable asset to any team.
